(JEE Health Factors and Metrics) CAST Metrics and Quality Rules Documentation

    (60010) Health Factors

        (60011) Transferability

            (61003) Programming Practices - OO Inheritance and Polymorphism

                (MetricID 4590) Avoid hiding attributes (JEE)

                (MetricID 4592) Avoid hiding static Methods

                (MetricID 4614) Proper overriding of 'clone()'

                (MetricID 4616) Proper overriding of 'finalize()'

                (MetricID 4712) Avoid inheritance down the Package path

                (MetricID 4714) Avoid Superclass knowing Subclass (JEE)

                (MetricID 7440) Suspicious similar method names or signatures in an inheritance tree

                (MetricID 7934) Avoid Superclass (or Interface) knowing Subclass (or Interface)

                (MetricID 8022) Avoid hiding attributes

            (61006) Documentation - Style Conformity

                (MetricID 2298) Avoid Artifacts with lines longer than 80 characters (JSP)

                (MetricID 4784) Avoid Artifacts with lines longer than 80 characters (JEE)

            (61007) Documentation - Bad Comments

                (MetricID 7126) Avoid Artifacts with high Commented-out Code Lines/Code Lines ratio

            (61008) Documentation - Automated Documentation

                (MetricID 4666) Classes and Interfaces must have JavaDoc Comments

                (MetricID 4668) Classes and Interfaces must have JavaDoc @author tag

                (MetricID 4670) Methods must have JavaDoc comments

                (MetricID 4672) Methods must have appropriate JavaDoc @param tags

                (MetricID 4674) Methods must have appropriate JavaDoc @return tags

                (MetricID 4676) Methods must have appropriate JavaDoc @throws tags

                (MetricID 4678) Methods must have appropriate JavaDoc @exception tags

                (MetricID 4680) Fields must have JavaDoc Comments

                (MetricID 7188) Private fields must have JavaDoc Comments

            (61009) Complexity - Algorithmic and Control Structure Complexity

                (MetricID 2296) Avoid Artifacts with High Cyclomatic Complexity (JSP)

                (MetricID 2300) Avoid artifacts with too many parameters (JSP)

                (MetricID 7132) Action Mappings should have few forwards

                (MetricID 7136) Each method in an Action Class should have a small complexity

                (MetricID 4556) Avoid large Classes - too many Constructors

                (MetricID 4560) Avoid large Interfaces - too many Methods

                (MetricID 7434) Avoid classes overriding only equals() or only hashCode()

                (MetricID 7802) Avoid Classes with a High Depth of Inheritance Tree

                (MetricID 4774) Avoid SQL Artifacts with High RAW SQL Complexity (JEE)

                (MetricID 4776) Avoid Artifacts with a complex SELECT clause (JEE)

                (MetricID 2290) Avoid Artifacts with High Fan-In (JSP)

                (MetricID 2292) Avoid Artifacts with High Fan-Out (JSP)

                (MetricID 7248) Avoid Packages with High Afferent Coupling (CA)

            (61015) Programming Practices - File Organization Conformity

                (MetricID 2258) All image files should be in a specific directory

                (MetricID 2260) All script files should be in a specific directory

                (MetricID 2262) All stylesheet files should be in a specific directory

                (MetricID 2264) All page files should be in a specific directory

                (MetricID 2266) Avoid non standard file extensions

                (MetricID 2244) Avoid undocumented Web Server Pages

                (MetricID 2248) Avoid Web Server pages having a very low Comment/Code ratio

            (61001) Architecture - Multi-Layers and Data Access

                (MetricID 2236) Avoid use of standard SQL API

                (MetricID 2252) Avoid direct access to database Tables (JSP)

                (MetricID 2256) Avoid direct access to database Procedures/Functions (JSP)

                (MetricID 4722) Track Classes referencing Database objects

                (MetricID 7134) Avoid having local forward with same name as global forward

                (MetricID 7138) Action Classes should only be called by Action Mappings tag (for Struts 1.x) or Action tag (for Struts 2.x)

                (MetricID 7140) Action Artifacts should not directly call a JSP page

                (MetricID 7142) Action Classes should have only one public method

                (MetricID 7144) Action Artifacts should not directly use database objects

                (MetricID 7146) JSP pages should only reference Java Objects associated to J2EE Scoped Bean

                (MetricID 7148) JSP pages should always be accessed through their tiles definition

                (MetricID 7238) Avoid calls between JSP Pages

                (MetricID 7240) Action Classes should only call Business Classes

                (MetricID 7244) Avoid direct usage of EJB Entity from the client

                (MetricID 7292) Avoid cyclical calls and inheritances between packages

                (MetricID 7392) Avoid having multiple artifacts deleting data on the same SQL table

                (MetricID 7492) Avoid many-to-many association

                (MetricID 7510) Use only Hibernate API to access to the database

                (MetricID 7654) Avoid database tables associated to more than one Entity

                (MetricID 7676) Avoid too many packages referencing Mainframe

                (MetricID 7700) Use only Struts HTTP Servlet

                (MetricID 7726) Avoid Action artifacts that call packages that reference database

                (MetricID 7914) Avoid direct access to Database Tables

                (MetricID 7916) Avoid direct use of Database objects (JSP/ASP)

                (MetricID 4574) Avoid using deprecated objects

                (MetricID 8102) Avoid hardcoded network resource names

            (61014) Programming Practices - Error and Exception Handling

                (MetricID 2232) Pages should use error handling page

                (MetricID 4600) Avoid using 'java.System.exit()'

                (MetricID 4604) Avoid using 'java.lang.Error'

                (MetricID 4622) Avoid empty finally blocks (JEE)

                (MetricID 4624) Avoid return statements in finally blocks (JEE)

                (MetricID 4626) Avoid missing default in switch statements (JEE)

                (MetricID 4652) Avoid direct Class inheritance from java.lang.Throwable

                (MetricID 4654) Avoid throwing an exception of type Exception (JEE)

                (MetricID 4656) Avoid declaring throwing an exception and not throwing it

                (MetricID 4658) Avoid catching an exception of type Exception, RuntimeException, or Throwable (JEE)

                (MetricID 4696) Avoid using 'System.err' and 'System.out' within a try catch block

                (MetricID 4698) Avoid using 'System.err' and 'System.out' outside a try catch block

                (MetricID 4700) Avoid using 'Throwable.printStackTrace()' within a try catch block

                (MetricID 4702) Avoid using 'Throwable.printStackTrace()' outside a try catch block

                (MetricID 7652) Avoid throwing an exception in a catch block without chaining it

                (MetricID 7782) Avoid empty finally blocks

                (MetricID 7788) Avoid empty catch blocks

                (MetricID 7824) The exception Exception should never been thrown. Always Subclass Exception and throw the subclassed Classes.

                (MetricID 4612) Avoid using native Methods (JNI)

                (MetricID 7202) Check usage of '==' and '!=' on objects

                (MetricID 7494) Persistent class method's equals() and hashCode() must access its fields through getter methods

                (MetricID 7504) Persistent classes should Implement hashCode() and equals()

                (MetricID 7506) Define equals() and hashCode() for component

                (MetricID 7508) Collection-typed attributes getter must be defined with the correct interface

                (MetricID 7556) Avoid instanceof in Methods that override or implement Object.equals(), Comparable.compareTo()

                (MetricID 7650) All types of a serializable Class must be serializable

                (MetricID 7708) Avoid using session.setFlushMode(FlushMode.COMMIT, FlushMode.NEVER or FlushMode.MANUAL)

                (MetricID 7710) Avoid non serializable Entities

                (MetricID 7712) Avoid public/protected setter for the generated identifier field

                (MetricID 7722) Avoid using references to the id in the persistent class's method equals()

                (MetricID 7724) Overriden equals() Methods in persistent Subclasses should only reference properties from the persistent base Class
